jd:
Role Title: Data Engineer
Location: Remote
Duration: 6 month contract
Visa: USC, GC, H4-EAD only
Note: Need 5 digit SSN with LinkedIn also need candidate visa copy image in hand.

Description: We are seeking an Onshore Data Engineer/Analyst to assist with the analysis of claims data. The ideal candidate will have strong skills in Python and SQL, and experience working with ADF and Kafka. Experience with claims and provider data is a plus.

Must have: 5+ years of overall experience in any of the skillsets- Snowflake, Azure Databricks, API development, and Kafka OR: 3+ years of strong experience with Azure data bricks and some experience with the others.

Responsibilities:
• Develop and maintain data pipelines to process claims and provider data.
• Perform data analysis to identify trends, anomalies, and insights.
• Ensure data quality and integrity throughout the data lifecycle.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand data requirements and deliver solutions.
• Utilize tools such as ADF and Kafka for data integration and processing.
• Provide technical support and troubleshooting for data-related issues.
• Document processes and maintain clear and comprehensive technical documentation.
